events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not as described, and I want to request a refund immediately.
The customer's request involves dissatisfaction with the product and a refund claim, so the issue is categorized as Refund.
Assigning a support agent to handle the refund request for the reported order issue.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I'm sorry to hear about the issue with your order and here to assist with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a brief description of the problem with the product so we can process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 782345 and the item is a different color than shown and wonâ€™t work for me. I want my money back as soon as possible.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate your refund immediately and provide a prepaid return shipping label for you to send back the product.
I appreciate your quick response and solution. I will return the product using the label once I receive it. Thank you!
Your refund process has been initiated and the return shipping label email has been sent to you. Please send the item back at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm that you have shipped the product back and your refund will be completed shortly upon receipt.
The returned product has been received and your refund completed. We are closing this case now and thank you for your patience.
We have sent you a customer satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. We appreciate your feedback.
